{"id":1213571607,"question_id":125,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"3Â weeks","timestamp":1711380275,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1213571607/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome","memory":"42.6 MB","code":"// Character.isLetterOrDigit(s.charAt(i))\n\nclass Solution {\n    public boolean isPalindrome(String s) {\n        // 2 pointers\n        int i = 0;\n        int j = s.length() - 1;\n        while (i < j) {\n            if (!Character.isLetterOrDigit(s.charAt(i))) {\n                i++;\n                continue; // Skip non-alphanumeric characters\n            }\n            if (!Character.isLetterOrDigit(s.charAt(j))) {\n                j--;\n                continue; // Skip non-alphanumeric characters\n            }\n            if (Character.toLowerCase(s.charAt(i)) != Character.toLowerCase(s.charAt(j))) {\n                return false; // Characters at i and j are not equal\n            }\n            i++;\n            j--;\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome","has_notes":true,"flag_type":1}
